title: Emmanuel Kissi’s Resume
text:
Student, Financial Analyst, and Entrepreneur

kis20001@byui.edu | My LinkedIn



Business Intelligence Operations Analyst at Goldman Sachs


Asset Management, Wealth Management, Investment Banking, Data Analytics, and Global Banking & Market.



Data governance, Financial modeling, Operational optimization, and Innovative data solutions.




April 2021 - April 2025
Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg, Idaho

Bachelor of Science in Business Analytics

Minor: Finance

Overall GPA: 3.95/4.00

Scholarships: Brigham Young University-Idaho Grant 2021-2025 (Acknowledgment of Academic Excellence)




June 2024 - Present
Goldman Sachs, Salt Lake City, Utah
- Utilized Alteryx to automate workflows, decreasing manual data entry by 40% and enhancing operational efficiency.
- Developed interactive Tableau dashboards, driving real-time insights and improving decision-making for senior management.
- Implemented data governance measures, reducing discrepancies by 30% and ensuring compliance with industry standards.
January 2022 - Present
Kissi Shuttle Services, Kumasi, Ghana
- Established a shuttle business with 7 vehicles, achieving a 20% annual revenue increase and reducing costs by 15%.
- Executed marketing strategies, including digital campaigns, resulting in a 65% expansion of the customer base.
- Supervised 15 employees, fostering productivity, excellent customer service, and a positive work environment.
September 2022 - May 2024
Career Success Mentor, Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg, Idaho
- Mentored 227 students, leading to 189 securing job offers.
- Achieved a 98.5% satisfaction rating through constructive feedback and personalized coaching.
- Stayed abreast of job market trends to offer relevant coaching strategies.
January 2023 - April 2023
Financial Analyst, The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, Salt Lake City, Utah
- Analyzed over 10,000 receipts to ensure compliance with financial controls.
- Processed 100+ invoices, ensuring timely and accurate payments.
- Presented audit findings using Power BI and Tableau, enabling informed decision-making.





Data Analysis: Microsoft Excel, Python, R, SQL, Pivot Tables.

Business Intelligence Tools: Tableau, Alteryx, Power BI.

Financial Tools: QuickBooks, IAN.

Soft Skills: Teamwork, Leadership, Communication, Time Management.





2021-2025
Brigham Young University-Idaho Grant – Awarded for Academic Excellence.

Last updated: December 2024
